TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExternalDataExchangeService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents a service that must be added to the workflow run-time engine for local services communications to be enabled. Local service implementations are required to be added to the for these services to be properly initialized and registered.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
A local service implementation is a class that implements an interface that is marked with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ExternalDataExchangeAttribute>. Local services added in this way are used by <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CallExternalMethodActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetService(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed

Docs.param: The of the interface implemented by the service to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the service implementation of the specified interface type, if the service is available.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the requested service, or null ( in Visual Basic) if the service cannot be resolved.
Docs.exception: The service is not registered with the runtime.
